welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Strabane! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere, we invite you to explore our city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make lasting memories here in South Strabane."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allegheny County Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Allegheny County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A mainly serves domestic flights for airlines such as American, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada, British Airways, and WOW Air.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C serves domestic flights for airlines such as Southwest and JetBlue.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
